description:
✂  Tools & Supplies I Recommend: https://goo.gl/Y7KKhY
$  Join the "Fellowship" on Patreon: https://goo.gl/ZZ4vBf


➳  http://www.blackmagiccraft.ca

➳ Join the Tabletop Crafters Guild: https://goo.gl/RMMqoh

This episode I build the creepy Gulthias Tree from the classic Dungeons & Dragons module "The Sunless Citadel". I am running the 5E version from Tales from the Yawning Portal.

DAS Clay tutorial by Luke APS: https://goo.gl/cyRy2L

Homemade Black Wash Tutorial: https://goo.gl/DUV36M

Static Grass Tufts Review: https://goo.gl/2rFbPK

BUY SUPPLIES USED IN THIS EPISODE
(As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases)

USA: http://amzn.to/2CHNk8m
Canada: http://amzn.to/2HKxE87

USA: http://amzn.to/2CIbRdD
Canada: http://amzn.to/2oqqbD1

USA: http://amzn.to/2qynRgZ
Canada: http://amzn.to/2BSiHR0

Woodland Scenics Fine Truf

Canada: http://amzn.to/2EZZGxZ

title: Gulthias Tree from The Sunless Citadel - D&D Tutorial (Black Magic Craft Episode 078)
